text: Patti Austin (born August 10, 1950)Some sources still list Austin's birth year as 1948. She gave this date in the early years of her career, in order to avoid child work regulations. "I lied about my age and I kicked it up two years because in those days it was a problem to work at that age. [...] I think women are very foolish when they say they're younger than they are anyway." Quoted in: is an American R&B; singer and songwriter. She was very popular in the late 1980s and early 1990s. Austin has had many hits on several music charts. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from New York City Category:Singer-songwriters from New York (state) Category:American R&B; singers Category:People from Harlem
title: Patti Austin
